brand-purchase.headline: How much are you planning to spend?

testimonial.preamble: Before you spend it, Raise it like

value-prop.headline-title: Think of Raise like a magic wallet.
value-prop.headline-body: Put regular cash in, get higher-value gift cards out. Redeem them instantly at checkout.

guarantee.headline: 100 Day Guarantee
guarantee.body: Count on us for every raise- we back all orders with our 100% guarantee for 100 days.

delivery.headline: Free & Instant Delivery
delivery.body: We send cards digitally and make it easy to redeem them from your phone or online.

spend.headline: More to Spend
spend.body: Cards are priced below face-value so you have more to spend at your favorite stores.
